sentences.en: ...Article 50 of the United Nations Charter.
sentences.cn: …联合国宪章第50条。

sentences.en: ...the last charter plane carrying out foreign nationals.
sentences.cn: …运出外国侨民的最后一班包机。

sentences.en: Are going by a scheduled flight or by charter?
sentences.cn: 这是一架正常班机还是团体包机?

sentences.en: Are you going by a scheduled flight or by charter.
sentences.cn: 你是搭班机去呢还是坐包机去呢?

sentences.en: Charter Communications, which has 14 working for it in Roxboro, followed suit in March.
sentences.cn: Charter通信在本地有14名员工, 3月份也步了Aleris的后尘.

sentences.en: Charter flights give / offer the best value for ( your ) money.
sentences.cn: 乘坐包机最合算.

sentences.en: He created the Olympic Charter, the Creed, the athlete's Oath, the opening and the closing ceremonies.
sentences.cn: 他制定了奥运会会章 、 信条和运动员誓词, 规定了开幕式和闭幕式的仪式.

sentences.en: If you want your free copy of the Patients' Charter fill this form in.
sentences.cn: 如果想要一份免费的《病人约章》，就把这张表填一下。

sentences.en: Never knock charter flights; they are opening up the world for budget-conscious travellers.
sentences.cn: 绝不要挑剔包机航班；他们使精打细算的乘客能够去往世界各地。

sentences.en: Reducing the number of police is just a thieves’ charter.
sentences.cn: 减少警力等于是给窃贼开了通行证。

sentences.en: So we got a backwater drift to sign the charter.
sentences.cn: 我们让死水流动来标记这一时刻.

sentences.en: the freedoms embodied in the UN charter
sentences.cn: 联合国宪章所体现的自由

sentences.en: The town’s charter was granted in 1838.
sentences.cn: 该镇的特许状是1838年颁发的。

sentences.en: They described the Home Office scheme as a "charter for cheats"
sentences.cn: 他们称内政部的方案是“对诈骗的纵容”。

sentences.en: They have yachts available for charter.
sentences.cn: 他们有供包租的游艇.

sentences.en: This new law amounts to a tax evader's charter.
sentences.cn: 这项新法律简直成了为逃税者开的许可证.

sentences.en: This travel firm specializes in charter flights.
sentences.cn: 这家旅游公司专营包机业务.

sentences.en: We chartered a boat to take us to some of the smaller islands.
sentences.cn: 我们包了一条船带我们到一些较小的岛上去。

sentences.en: We will charter a steamer to convey the goods.
sentences.cn: 我们将租一艘船运送这批货物.

sentences.en: We would like to charter a flight to go back to Paris.
sentences.cn: 我们想乘包机返回巴黎.

sentences.en: You said if I revoked their charter, you'd get me into Columbia.
sentences.cn: 你说过如果我撤销他们的许可, 你就让我进入哥伦比亚大学.

words.tran_cn: 人民宪章主义；人民宪章运动
宪章派；图解专家；宪章运动者

phrases.tran_cn: 佣船契约；包船契约；租船方
特许学校，契约学校；委办学校
程租船；计程包船；航程佣船

trans.tran_en: A charter plane or boat is one which is rented for use by a particular person or group and which is not part of a regular service
a statement of the principles, duties, and purposes of an organization
a signed statement from a government or ruler which allows a town, organization, or university to officially exist and have special rights

trans.tran_cn: 包租（飞机、船等），给予…特权
trans.tran_en: to pay a company for the use of their aircraft, boat etc
to pay a company for the use of their aircraft, boat etc
